title: Vehicle Details
description: Details specific to a vehicle reservation.

xdm:agentID.title: Agent ID
xdm:agentID.description: Agent ID associated with the vehicle booking.

xdm:averageDailyPrice.title: Average Daily Price
xdm:averageDailyPrice.description: Average daily price of the vehicle.

xdm:basePrice.title: Base Price
xdm:basePrice.description: Base price before any discounts are added.

xdm:couponCode.title: Coupon Code
xdm:couponCode.description: Coupon code associated with the vehicle booking.

xdm:currency.title: Currency
xdm:currency.description: Currency used to make the purchase.

xdm:discountPercent.title: Discount Percent
xdm:discountPercent.description: Discount percentage associated with the booking.

xdm:dropOffDate.title: Drop-off Date
xdm:dropOffDate.description: The drop-off date of the for the vehicle reservation.

xdm:guestID.title: Guest ID
xdm:guestID.description: Guest ID associated with the vehicle booking.

xdm:pickUpDate.title: Pick-up Date
xdm:pickUpDate.description: The pick-up date of the for the vehicle reservation.

xdm:rentersAge.title: Renter's Age
xdm:rentersAge.description: Age of the renter on the vehicle reservation.

xdm:vehicleClass.title: Vehicle Class
xdm:vehicleClass.description: The class/category of vehicle being reserved.

xdm:vehicleDropOffLocationCode.title: Drop-off Location Code
xdm:vehicleDropOffLocationCode.description: The airport location code for the vehicle drop off.

xdm:vehiclePickUpLocationCode.title: Pick-up Location Code
xdm:vehiclePickUpLocationCode.description: The airport location code for the vehicle pick up.

xdm:vehicleDifferentDropoffLocation.title: Different Drop-off Location
xdm:vehicleDifferentDropoffLocation.description: Indicates if a vehicle reservation has a different drop-off location than the pick-up location.
